snippet: The president’s criticism showcased a determination to broaden his indictment of Mr. Trump into an indictment of the Republican Party....
abstract: Pres Barack Obama, speaking at Hillary Clinton rally at Florida Memorial University, denounces Republican Sen Marco Rubio for changing his position and endorsing presidential nominee Donald Trump.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS
byline.contributor: Mark Landler reported from Miami Gardens, and Julie Hirschfeld Davis from Phoenix.

lead_paragraph: The president’s criticism showcased a determination to broaden his indictment of Mr. Trump into an indictment of the Republican Party.

headline.main: Widening Attack on G.O.P., Obama Targets Marco Rubio in Florida
headline.print_headline: Widening Attack on G.O.P., Obama Targets Rubio in Florida

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
